messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
hi
Hello! I am Paul, your inspirational Digital Travel Assistant. I am here to help find a travel destination and travel plan for you. When you think of holiday, what comes to mind?
i want to fly to australia next year end of februrary

That sounds like an exciting trip! To confirm, you would like to fly to Australia in late February next year. Could you please specify the city or airport in Australia you are interested in? Also, could you
please inspire me, i want to fly for 2 weeks

how much does a flight cost from zurich

show me for sydney and melbourne
No text response.
something else

If you're looking for something different, Australia offers a variety of experiences beyond the usual highlights. Consider exploring the beautiful beaches of the Gold Coast, the wine regions of the Barossa
give flight options

brisbane

around 25.2
